name: Coupled Clichés
description:
Play 3 fun and fast paced mini games!  This game is a submission for the Game Off 2022 game jam.

Level 1: "If Looks Could Kill You Would Freeze Like A Deer In The Headlights".  Run around a dungeon collecting coins to open a gate for a magical horn.  Only by taking the horn can you find your way out.  Avoid giant scorpions, spiders, and mummies!  And beware Medusa.  If she sees you, you will be frozen for 3 seconds and may get caught by the beasts following you.

Leve 2: "You Will Catch Hell If You Beat A Dead Horse".  Start running!  Nothing is fair in this race against a dead horse to catch a devil named "Hell".  

Level 3: "Hen Pecked At A Chick Flick".  In this mini game you are a farmer collecting runaway chicks.  You must "Flick" all 10 to the cage within 2 minutes or you lose!  Watch out for the momma Hen!  She is fast and she is angry.  If she catches you she will knock you down and take precious seconds away from your chick flicking adventure.

Have fun!
